To fix  steam_rld.ini error simply edit that file, go to line 'Player Name' and add your name between speechmarks, do the same also for SKIDROW.ini

could i please get some help? i downloaded it and then ran the installer, it seamed to install fine. but when i click the dishonored.exe i comes up with this error message:
"the program can not start because binkw32.dll is missing from your computer."
copy the binkw32.dll file from C:Program FilesGameSystem folder to the game's root folder
or U can download "binkw32.dll" separately(Google it) and copy it to the game root folder(where U installed the game.
